articles.title: COVID-19: How Fake News Could Help Spread the Coronavirus
articles.description: A new study links the spread of fake news and misinformaiton to the spread of infectious disease. Scientists say it could encourage dangerous behaviors.
articles.content:
The proliferation of fake news could be exacerbating disease outbreaks like the new coronavirus, say scientistswhile efforts to tackle the spread of misinformation has the potential to save lives.
